## Location:
```{r message=FALSE}
library(leaflet)
library(ggmap)
location=geocode( "Hanoi" )
m <- leaflet()%>%
  addTiles() %>%  # Add default OpenStreetMap map tiles
  setView(lng=location$lon, lat=location$lat, zoom = 05) %>%
addMarkers(lng=location$lon, lat=location$lat, popup="Hanoi")
m

```


## coffee

Egg coffee @ The Giang Café and Coconut coffee @ Cong Caphe .Two are in my top 10 coffee list.
